name: prompthub
description: AIプロンプトの共有と発見のためのコミュニティプラットフォーム

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install && npm run build
scripts.render-build: npm install && cd client && npm install && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=/ npm run build && mkdir -p ../build && cp -r build/* ../build/ && cp build/index.html ../build/index.html && ls -la ../build && echo 'Build completed and copied to root/build. PORT will be: '$PORT
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:client
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format:client
